mapper.insert: insert into business_detials (business_name, pouring_position, pouring_method, quantities, number_of_vehicles, strength_grade, unit_price_of_convrete, freight, total_amount, remarks) values (#{business_name}, #{pouring_position}, #{pouring_method}, #{quantities}, #{number_of_vehicles}, #{strength_grade}, #{unit_price_of_convrete}, #{freight}, #{total_amount}, #{remarks})
